definitions.text: the process of becoming softened and saturated as a consequence of being immersed in water (or other liquid)
examples: a good soak put life back in the wagon

definitions.text: washing something by allowing it to soak

examples: I soaked in the hot tub for an hour

definitions.text: rip off; ask an unreasonable price
cover with liquid; pour liquid onto
examples: souse water on his hot face

definitions.text: leave as a guarantee in return for money
heat a metal prior to working it
